ConversationMessageDefinition.label: How to sell cryptocurrency - Mobile Web

primitiveValues.formulaTemplate:
To place a market sell order using the Ndax website on your mobile device, follow these steps:
1. Log in at ndax.io 2. Scroll to QUICK BUY/SELL 3. Select the crypto you are trying to sell 4. Enter the amount of CAD or the amount of that crypto you want to sell 5. Tap the red Sell button 6. Review the Order Confirmation screen 7. Tap Confirm
âœ… Your order will be executed instantly at the best available market price.
